# Greatspear
## Overview
This broad-bladed spear has a long, flat blade, and is too heavy to wield properly without proficiency.


-tx-
| **Exotic Weapon** ||||||||||
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| | **Two-Handed Melee Weapon** | **Cost** | **Dmg (S)** | **Dmg (M)** | **Critical** | **Range Increment** | **Weight** | **Type** |  |
| | Greatspear | 25 gp | 1d10 | 2d6 | x3 | 10 ft. | 9 lbs. | P | Reach |

**Source:** Complete Warrior (WotC), pg. 145
